videos.description: Virginia's Kyle Guy drains a 3-pointer as the shot clock expires early on for for the Cavaliers as part of a 12-0 run.
videos.headline: Guy beats the buzzer on 3-pointer for Virginia

videos.description: North Carolina's Justin Jackson connects on a catch and shoot 3-pointer from the top of the key.
videos.headline: Jackson buries 3-pointer for UNC

videos.description: Kyle Guy steals a pass then feeds Devon Hall who scores on a nifty lay-in for Virginia.
videos.headline: Defense leads to offense for Virginia with Hall layup

videos.description: Virginia head coach Tony Bennett talks about his team's game plan against North Carolina and what his team needs to do in the 2nd half to come away with a victory.
videos.headline: Bennett on the challenges North Carolina has presented

videos.description: North Carolina head coach Roy Williams on what his team needs to do better in the second half.
videos.headline: Williams: "We stunk it up"

videos.description: Virginia's Kyle Guy fires and connects from the left corner to get the Cavaliers going in the 2nd half.
videos.headline: Guy drills corner 3-pointer for Virginia

videos.description: North Carolina's Joel Berry II receives a pass from Luke Maye then hits a 3-pointer from the top of the key.
videos.headline: Berry II buries crucial 3-pointer for UNC

videos.description: Virginia's Jack Salt puts up a shot the bounces a few times before finally falling into the hoop.
videos.headline: Virginia gets generous bounce on Salt's hook shot

videos.description: Virginia's Kyle Guy talks about playing extended minutes and how he felt during his game high 17-point performance.
videos.headline: Virginia's Kyle Guy on his 17-point performance

videos.description: Doris Burke joins Scott Van Pelt to break down Virginia shutting down North Carolina and how much she likes the game of Kyle Guy. Burke also breaks down the ceiling of the Cavaliers come tournament time.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Analysis (Burke says Virginia took the fight to UNC) 2017/02/27 ESHEET SVP SC

videos.headline: Burke says Virginia took the fight to UNC
